entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Princeton
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:21 AM PST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Princeton Airport 12:23 PM PST Thursday 26 January 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.2 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 87 %
Dewpoint: -0.3°C
Wind: ENE 3 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near plus 1. POP 30%
